bio: PhD (c) at DTU Management Engineering (Denmark) My research spans collaboration, innovation, co-design, cleantech & other bits and pieces: www.openinnovate.eu University of Bath MSc in Innovation and Technology Management University of British Columbia Pontificia Universidad Catlica de Chile Business and Economics DTU PhD Engineering Design Pontificia Universidad Catlica de Chile Lecturer and Deputy Director of Innovation and Entrepreneurship La Tercera NEOS DTU PhD Candidate
